abstract: The investment bank announced Thursday that its top executives would be paid in the form of a special stock, rather than in cash.
snippet: The investment bank announced Thursday that its top executives would be paid in the form of a special stock, rather than in cash.
lead_paragraph: Moving to quell the uproar over the return of big paydays on Wall Street, Goldman Sachs announced on Thursday that its top executives would forgo cash bonuses this year and that it would give shareholders a say in determining compensation.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Alters Its Bonus Policy to Quell Uproar
headline.print_headline: Top 30 at Goldman Will Get Stock, Not Cash, as Bonus
